00024 template <typename T, int N, int C>
00025 class Array : public ArrayBase< Array<T,N,C> > {

00027     typedef typename Super::Core Core;
00028     typedef typename Super::CorePtr CorePtr;

00122     template <typename T_, int N_, int C_>
00123     bool operator==(Array<T_,N_,C_> const & other) const {
00124         return this->getData() == other.getData()
00125             && this->getShape() == other.getShape()
00126             && this->getStrides() == other.getStrides();
00127     }
00128 
00132     template <typename T_, int N_, int C_>
00133     bool operator!=(Array<T_,N_,C_> const & other) const {
00134         return !this->operator==(other);
00135     }
00136 
00138     void swap(Array & other) {
00139         std::swap(this->_data, other._data);
00140         this->_core.swap(other._core);
00141     }
00142 
00150     bool isUnique() const { return this->_core->isUnique(); }
